entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
